H0.text: Tintern Abbey, made famous by Wordsworth’s poetry, stands on which river. River Severn

H1.text: Tintern Abbey, made famous by Wordsworth’s poetry, stands on which river. River Usk

H2.text: Tintern Abbey, made famous by Wordsworth’s poetry, stands on which river. River Thames

H3.text: Tintern Abbey, made famous by Wordsworth’s poetry, stands on which river. Wye

A4.text: Tintern Abbey is situated on the Welsh bank of the River Wye
